channel.title: Linux on Love FOSS and Gaming
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Love FOSS and Gaming

item.title: OBS with GPU
item.author: jlozada2426@protonmail.com (Jonathan Lozada De La Matta)
item.description: I started using OBS to stream but, I noticed that in most games it uses a lot of CPU so the games start to stutter and the audio gets cut off. I started googling around and saw an article from gamingonlinux.com on how to use the GPU for streaming instead of the CPU. Of course I ran into a lot of issues since I been noticing more and more lately that most linux desktop or gaming is build with debian/ubuntu/arch in mind and fedora usually lags behind.
